r.s: Decode and Encode data in Bittorrent format
r.d: This package consists of three classes which handles the encoding and decoding of data in Bittorrent format. You can also extract useful informations from .torrent files, create .torrent files and query the torrent's scrape page to get its statistics.
r.n: * Alexiev fixed bug #5836 * Added test for info hash
